name: 奥利维娅·巴克尔
name_full: 奥利维娅·巴克尔 Olivia Buckle
introduction: Olivia Buckle is an actress from Vancouver, BC. She began her career in 2009 as a dancer and choreographer. Her dancing and athleticism led to her being cast as an Amazon in 2015 on, "Wonder Woman" where she was trained by the stunt team as a Specialty Action performer. When the film wrapped, she studied in London at the renowned Guildhall School, followed by an intense program at a small theatre school in France called, FONACT. In 2017 Olivia moved to LA to work primarily in film and television. She is dual citizen between CA/US, has representation in LA, and has found success in commercials, modeling and indie feature films. Olivia just wrapped another feature film, so now has 3 features in post-production ready to be release in 2022!
